Teaching

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
teaching:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of teaching:, general subclasses such as action, related classes and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about teaching:
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

a

teaching:Teaching
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Person's action of communicating information in order to help another person to acquire knowledge, competence or value.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
teaching:
rdfs:label
teaching (en)
Unterricht (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
human:Procedure
